hero.title: Who are we?
hero.description: At CM Abogadas we are a young, close-knit, and committed firm, founded in April 2024. We have experienced constant growth thanks to the trust of those who choose us.

team.title: Experts in defending your rights
team.description1: Our team is made up of lawyers registered with the Barcelona Bar Association (ICAB), experts in immigration and administrative law. We bring legal rigor and deep knowledge of current regulations.
team.description2: We work with our own style: combining legal commitment with a close, empathetic human touch. We know that behind every file is a person with a story that deserves to be heard.

model.title: A modern firm, without physical barriers.
model.description1: CM ABOGADAS is based in Barcelona but operates without the limitation of a permanent physical office. This model allows us to fully serve anyone, anywhere in Spain, through digital tools, video calls, and constant communication via WhatsApp.
model.description2: By not depending on a permanent physical office, we adapt to your schedule and needs in an agile way. We offer direct personalized attention without location limitations.

features.title: 100% Online and Available
features.description: Video calls and digital management so you can move forward from home, wherever you are.

features.title: In-person when you need it
features.description: If necessary, we organize in-person meetings in suitable spaces in Barcelona, combining proximity and comfort.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Clear communication from the first moment. No surprises, with honesty about the viability of your case.

items.title: Commitment
items.description: We get personally involved in every case, treating it as if it were our own. Your success is our success.

items.title: Agility
items.description: Flexible schedules, quick responses, and constant progress. We don't make you wait for what you need now.
